description.ko: 유동적인 형태와 부드러운 전이가 생명과 에너지의 끊임없는 움직임을 떠올리게 하는 자연스러운 리듬의 매혹적인 시각화입니다.
description.en: A mesmerizing visualization of natural rhythm, where fluid forms and soft transitions evoke the seamless movement of life and energy.

prompt: Macro photography of iridescent liquid swirls, organic flowing shapes, soft curves, pearlescent textures, bioluminescent glow, smooth color gradients, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, abstract nature.
